Attributes.description: Numerical techniques for basic mathematical processes involving discretization, and their analysis. Interpolation and approximation, including splines and least squares data fitting; numerical differentiation and integration; introduction to numerical initial value ordinary differential equations.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of CPSC 103, CPSC 110, CPEN 221, EOSC 211, PHYS 210 and one of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121, SCIE 001 and one of MATH 152, MATH 221, MATH 223.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: To, Room: Be
